title: Ricardo Santos
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210509/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210509/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Ricardo Santos**

Portuguese type designer and owner of [Vanarchiv](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210509/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Vanarchiv) and co-founder of [Tiponautas](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210509/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tiponautas).

[www.vanarchiv.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210509/http:/www.vanarchiv.com/)
author: Grant Hutchinson
